Text: Does it work on macs?
Probably, but I can't guarantee it working on Mac. I only tested it on Windows. It probably works on Mac too though.
I downloaded everything. I went to the websites to get the crack and did exactly what was told, but I still get a CD authentication failure

kaladesskel, you can try disabling ISO-mounting programs like Deamon Tools when you try to play and see if it works. Maybe the protection won't work if you have virtual drives created by such program. So try disabling it, and see if it runs. Or if you have the base game cracked, remove the crack (leave the original file for base game) and try running the game. And see if the crack you use with Ambitions matched the game version (depends if you patched the game or not) or try using another crack...
Oh and another suggestion. If you can't get Ambitions crack to work you can try installing a newer add-on like Late Night or Fast Lane and cracking that. But only if you want that add-on too.

oh and another question do i have to crack it ? cos after i shall be installing late night a cracked version ????

@kezikezi
Sorry for late reply. If you still need to know... If you're installing later expansions make sure you keep the original .exe (not the cracked one) and just install the next expansion (Late Night in your case) and crack that game only (or some cracks might require you to crack the original game too, but you don't need to crack other expansions). If you keep the .exe for this game replaced with the cracked one during the install of the next EP it might not work... So make sure you use the original one when installing.

I have all of the expansion packs (bought it) except for ambition and if I install this, will it work? Latest v. of sims.

This should work with original and downloaded Sims 3 and any other expansions, just make sure you have the latest one cracked and in some cases (depends on which crack you're using) the first game, but not the other EPs. So, if you have Late Night or Generations (or any of the stuff packs realised after Ambitions), you do NOT need to crack Ambitions. If Ambitions is your only EP/stuff pack, or the latest one, you crack this.
